original_title: Fujii Kaze "Free" Live 2021 at NISSAN Stadium
overview: This summer, we are limited in many ways, having to practice restraint and patience, tied by so many restrictions. But as human beings,we should be more free. September 4th, on the grass, under the sky. We hope that through this one hour, the hearts of many people will become “Free”.
title: Fujii Kaze "Free" Live 2021 at NISSAN Stadium
